metadata.title: CVE-2019-20790 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: OpenDMARC through 1.3.2 and 1.4.x, when used with pypolicyd-spf 2.0.2, allows attacks that bypass SPF and DMARC authentication in situations where the HELO field is inconsistent with the MAIL FROM field.

criterions.comment: opendmarc package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
